attributes.action: Keep our local record store open,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In its time this store has been the back bone of the musicians and music lovers alike, the staff have been instrumental in creating and cultivating exciting events and concerts and must be kept open.Don't let local independant record shops be pushed out by bigger shops just because its more financially viable! It shuts in February, don't let that happen!
